parameters.name: CommonName
parameters.description: The Common Name of the certificate.

parameters.name: Country
parameters.description: The country or region in which the organization is located. Default value: CN.

parameters.name: Organization
parameters.description: The name of the organization. Default value: Alibaba Inc.

parameters.name: OrganizationUnit
parameters.description: The name of the department. Default value: Aliyun CDN.

parameters.name: SANs
parameters.description: The Subject Alternative Name (SAN) extension of the SSL certificate. This extension is used to add domain names to the certificate. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: State
parameters.description: The provincial district. Default value: Zhejiang.
